title: Digital Learning Playground: Mixed Reality-Based Social Inquiry Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Corporate Youth Social Education Program Exploring Social Phenomena Experientially Through Interactive Game-Based Learning in a Mixed-Reality Environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform social problem-solving processes in mixed-reality simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the interaction principles of social structures (political/economic/cultural) through game-based activities in three or more ways
Learners can improve their decision-making abilities related to digital citizenship by 70% or more through collaborative mission performance in a VR environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
